sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>every month, the e-mnail that contains a CSV file, will be processed and uptade the report</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Sam Hassani">3937d13e4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c735</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="BrightStarr" name="BrightStarr">2b33a4124fa463007e72aa95d310c7c7</assignment_group> <category display_value="Inbound action">5ba54b474f6ce3007e72aa95d310c7a1</category> <company display_value="BrightStarr">c507ddfa4f6ca3007e72aa95d310c79b</company> <description>Add information on a monthly basis to the u_company_sla_report table with the information from the e-mail</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 04:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp>1970-01-01 04:00:00</estimated_hours_sp> <notes/> <number>TAS0001219</number> <package display_value="PACK0001018">b395341f4f6027007e72aa95d310c7fc</package> <short_description>Convert e-mail: Unily Uptime Report</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-19 17:13:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cceb9eb04f1523007e72aa95d310c711</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-29 17:58:51</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name>Hikon - Uptime Data Report</update_set_name> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
